meanings.definition: Retaining color without fading or running.
meanings.sent1: The colorfast shirt stayed bright even after many washes.
meanings.sent2: She bought a colorfast fabric to ensure her dress would not lose its vibrant hue.
meanings.sent3: The colorfast crayons made the drawing competition more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her memory of that day was as colorfast as the painting on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The colorfast flowers in the garden added a beautiful touch to the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The dye used in the industry must be colorfast to meet quality standards.
meanings.sent2: She tested the fabric to confirm it was a colorfast before using it for the project.
meanings.sent3: The colorfast inks in the printer ensured clear and lasting prints.
meanings.sent4: The colorfastness of the paint made it a popular choice among artists.
meanings.sent5: The colorfast nature of the material made it ideal for outdoor use.
